title: Topic 002 Question 031
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains an instance of SQL Server on an Azure virtual machine named SQLVM1 and a user named User1. SQLVM1 hosts a database named DB1.
You need to ensure that User1 can create a scheduled task to perform a full backup of DB1. The solution must use the principle of least privilege.
Which built-in database role should you assign to User1?
